radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar infiltrates and ground-glass opacities, with mild proximal esophageal dilatation. No lymphadenopathy or masses were detected.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat chest CT 9 days later showed a reduction in infiltrates and ground-glass opacities after treatment.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal head, brain stem, and neck.
